title: 🍱 "The time is always right to do what is right." - Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.
content:
is sponsored by Sourcegraph! Using the rules of Wordle, given a guessWord and a solutionWord, return a set of emojis returned from the guessWord.

Example:

let solutionWord = "fudge"

$ wordleGuess("reads", solutionWord)
$ "⬛🟨⬛🟨⬛"

$ wordleGuess("lodge", solutionWord)
$ "⬛⬛🟩🟩🟩"
